website_summaries.verdict: Simple design, breathable mesh fabric, and easy-on design make this a decent choice.
pros: Comes in a range of sizes and colors
Extra security snaps and easy release to ensure safety
cons: Some complaints of very small harnesses and needing to buy one or two sizes up

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness
customer_reviews.text: Seems comfortable on my 2-yr old Maine Coone. He gets right into it with no trouble since the buckle is on his back and not his belly. The clasp is sturdy, and with the Velcro flap, I feel confident that he will not slip out. Well designed so his long hair does not get caught in the Velcro or buckle. What do you think of my little boy?
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic21

customer_reviews.title: Poorly sewn together
customer_reviews.text: Stitching coming apart after 2.5 months. Just after the return window closed, the harness started falling apart. There was no chewing or unusual use. Just normal use for a couple of months. Products should last longer than this. I probably will sew it up, but seriously, why should I have to for a new product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher McMahon

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR NARROW OR TRIANGULAR HEADS!!!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: If your dog has a narrow or triangular head, all they need to do is assume the begging position and pull back ever so slightly and you will be holding a very empty harness!! It fits snugly.. but there is a very dangerous and possibly deadly design flaw. SO GLAD that I did not take my dog outside with this harness!!!
customer_reviews.author: Claudine Moon

customer_reviews.title: For a decent sized cat
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the fit and quality. A small fit my rather large 15-20lb house cat.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size chart
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and put it on my 21lbs Jack Russell terrier. Normally I would order a medium cause he's a medium size dog but I went by the chart. Glad I did cause he measured as a Large. It's easy to put on and is light. Fits like a glove. Pickles is giving me his 'awkward' look since its new! LOL. Definitely take measurements and go by chart. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: xs size is perfect! Nice material
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 11 pounds,,xs size is perfect ! Nice material,very comfortable,my cat love it!
customer_reviews.author: meiman hsu

customer_reviews.title: He likes to go for long walks in it and thinks it is quite comfortable. He loves the bright orange trim and the ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat Beasty loves this vest. He likes to go for long walks in it and thinks it is quite comfortable. He loves the bright orange trim and the little reflective tabs too! It buckles nice and snug and makes him feel safe while walking on his leash. It is easy for him to get in and out of with help from his people. Beasty give this vest a 5 claws up!
customer_reviews.author: T_for2

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a petite cat whose wily ways drove me to try walking her. She LOVES it, but pulled out of the first two (skimpy) harnesses. This one is better and more secure - especially when you pull the Velcro tight before snapping into place. The 2 leash hooks make it even more secure. She could probably still wiggle out with serious effort, but it's the best I've tried yet. Plus she looks like a bada$$ mofo, which counters my own crazy cat lady walking her cat vibe just enough to be passable.
customer_reviews.author: LBB

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what happened???
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these before and it is fantastic, I purchased it about a month ago. I wanted a second harness in a different color. I received the second one and I’ve only had it since 11/17/2017 and it is already falling apart at the seams together and it looks completely different than the first one I bought. It’s marked large but it has to be extra lodge of the manufacture must have tagged it incorrect. Really not sure what happened? I was very happy and thrilled with the first one I purchase, this one though I’m not happy with it and I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: S.B55

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small based on the size chart, but need to return it, it was way too big on my 9 pound cat. So I ordered a XS and it fits much better. My cat loves her walks and has taken to this new harness quickly. She had a kitty holster for 5 years and it is too small now. This harness has much more range of movement in her neck and she seems alot more comfortable in this one. It's made well, and feels sturdy. The only thing is the fuschia looks more like a hot pink to me.
customer_reviews.author: ZomDee

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Escaped Out of This Harness
customer_reviews.text: Not the most secure harness. My Yorkie Terrier escaped this and took off running. This was a BIG scare as we were walking in the park. Someone had to dive and catch my dog to prevent her from getting run over by a car in the street. If my little Yorkie can escape out of this imagine what a big dog can do.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt BunnieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dog Escaped
customer_reviews.text: My frenchie escaped out of this harness on a busy Chicago street. All he had to do was pull back ever so slightly and it was empty. He went running down the street and a helpful bystander had to literally pin him up against a tree to stop him. This was a HUGE scare and if he can do it, I know others can too. Overall, it seemed like a soft, comfortable harness, but anything they can escape out of with ease, I will be avoiding. Proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma M.

customer_reviews.title: Super dangerous if you are using it on walks
customer_reviews.text: My dog went backwards when we were walking and stepped right out of this. Then ran into traffic and it was a scary moment. It fit tightly so it did not occur to me that if the dog were to go backwards they could squirm out of this harness. Super dangerous if you are using it on walks. Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our pug puppy
customer_reviews.text: This fits our pug puppy great, when he was about 6 lbs we bought a small and it was slightly loose but still worked. The picture was taken at the vet when he was 10 lbs and it fit perfect. Now he's about 13 lbs and it's almost too tight so I will be purchasing a medium for him! I can tell he likes his harness and the material is WAY more comfy than the one with straps usually sold at pet stores. It kind of reminds me of a snug sweater, in the winter he'll probably wear it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to put on even stubborn cats
customer_reviews.text: I have two size mediums. On my large fluffy cat it is a bit snug, and on my medium sized short hair it's a bit loose, but she hasn't escaped yet. As far as harnesses go this is really easy to get them in and out of due to the large arm holes and fasteners on the back. I didn't need help like I usually do. Feels like good quality too. When taking this off for the first time you may want to keep them distracted/talk to them/etc. as the velcro noise will freak them out.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: My white cat looks like a badass with this
customer_reviews.text: My white cat looks like a badass with this! She's 5.2 lbs and I got the XS. I have to close the velcro strap to the very tightest part but I love that it doesn't choke her at all. It's lightweight and I bought the black leash separately.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Solanki

customer_reviews.title: It worked on our CAT!!
customer_reviews.text: We use it on our cat (he was brought up as an indoor cat for its first 3 years, by his previous "parents"). Because outdoors is such a new and overwhelming experience for our naive cat, we decided to use a lease. This one is great: the cat accepted it within 1 - 2 days. We put it on only when we take him outdoors (backyard for the time being) ; the idea is that he (hopefully) associates the harness with the excitment of going outdoors. Anyway, it works. Note: It is important though to take accurate measurements for good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: A big no-no for cats
customer_reviews.text: I measured my cat as 13" and since she still might grow I got a small. Well, it was way too big and my cat slipped out of it far too easily. It defeated the purpose of having a leash in the first place. Then I decided to buy the x-small and it fit well.. but the cat could still easily slip out whenever she wants! Do not buy this for cats it's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it, cat hates it lol
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what its suppose to do lol. I measured the girth of my cat around he was 18" so i ordered the medium because I didnt want him to have a whole lot of wiggle room to get out of it. The medium was a good fit, he's a pretty fat cat. Not tight at all, i adjusted the velcro straps. He hates it lol. As soon as I put it on him he laid flat and stayed there for an hour. But i know he'll get used to it once I finally start letting him explore outside.
customer_reviews.author: Williams Fam

customer_reviews.title: ESCAPE PROOF. SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: My one year old Shih Tzu could escape every harness I put on him until this one. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: CLASP  IS VERY DIFFICULT TO OPEN...ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: I love the harness itself, but the latch is so stiff . I can literally not open it. I guess I have some arthritis in my dads, but that does not keep me from doing anything else. This is EXTREMELY HARD to open...and I live alone. I just had it on my dog for two days until I could get a neighbor to open it; he agreed that it is very difficult. That makes it unsafe as a quick release is important. It is very true that the sizing is unusual...they really run small, so look carefully at the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen craig

customer_reviews.title: “FALSE ADVERTISEMENT”!!!
customer_reviews.text: “False Advertisement”!!! The harness I got shipped to me looks nothing like the one online. ACTUALLY IT’S NOT EVEN THE SAME ONE, IT DOESN'T EVEN HAVE VOYAGER BRAND ON IT LIKE IN THE PICTURES! IT SAYS “Ruffington” Looks like a cheap knockoff version of what’s posted online. (SEE FOR YOURSELF IN MY PICTURES I POSTED) And to top it all off I ordered a Size Medium (M) & received a Size Small (S). The bag has a sticker label on it saying Medium, but the harness itself has a Size Small tag on it. Whoever packaged it did a poor job & should be fired.
customer_reviews.author: Raphangello

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 lb cat loves it! She kept it on for hours after her walk! The XS fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Balfantz

customer_reviews.title: I love these for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love these for my dogs. This is the second one I buy for my dogs. The last one he had lasted a couple years. I would recommend. I got a small.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: amazing fit!
customer_reviews.text: We have two Dachshunds and they are hard to fit for harnesses so I can't believe how great these things are. They are soft and comfy (no rubbing under their front legs), easy to put on, adjustable at the velcro on top, very lightweight (even for summer months) and cute to boot. Our smaller doxie wears a small and the slightly larger doxie with a wider chest wears a medium.
customer_reviews.author: kimme + roger

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend, very disappointing :(
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed, I bought two of these and i’m not sure if one of them is deffective but it hasn’t even been a week and it has already begun to tear where the Velcro is. My dog is a beagle and is at 24 pounds and she literally wears it all day and I think we’ve only taken it off for bathtime, so for it to tear like that So quickly really makes me kind of sad I ordered these. The other harness I have For my other dog seems to be good so far but now I’m worried about the quality. Would not recommend if this is usually how the quality it is not because of a defect. :(
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Training my cat Precious with Kitten Angels to be a certified therapy cat so we need to teach her to leash walk when we go to hospitals and nursing homes. She doesn't even notice she is wearing it she is 8 pounds and Xs was puurrrfect size! It is also great since it's pretty and pink when we take her to children with terminal illness to add cuteness
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to write a bad review. I was going to return this but decided at the last minute to keep it just in case we needed an extra harness. When I tried to unhook the latch, I found it was absolutely impossible to open! It's good that it's secure, of course, but it has to be usable. This pinched my fingers terribly and I still cannot open it. Too bad - it looks adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Woman

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and not meant for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: This halter is the noisiest thing I've ever heard. While your dog is wearing it, the metal loops clonk against each other and the plastic clip. It's like putting a bell on a cat. I take it off when we're in the house since the noise would drive any animal crazy. Also, the smaller sizes are not meant to be used with a dog leash that has a small clip. The leash clip can not fit over the two metal loops. You can only attach it to one, making it less secure. I really don't like this halter at all.
customer_reviews.author: Scout

customer_reviews.title: Holds most of my cat in place
customer_reviews.text: My cat is able to get her arm out of the harness but the rest of her body is still securely in place. I took her for a walk the other day and she thought it was fine although it looks tight on her. Cats in general don't like to be in harnesses so I recommend letting her be around the harness for a few days and then let her wear just the harness around before taking her for a walk. The material of the harness could be better, during the hotter days the material looks like it makes you itch and sweat more.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: I ended up with the small and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but I thought I would share since I was having hard time figuring out which size. The one review with the maincoon cat helped. I too have a maincoon and fell between small and medium. Mine is about 18lb...I ended up with the small and it's perfect. One small detail is mine took a few days to get used to it..he walk around like he had something on his back but he finally decided it was ok.
customer_reviews.author: B. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Best for dogs, not for cats
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I bought a size too small, but my Maine Coon (A 16+lb cat) managed to back out of it one night when he got spooked. We tried criss-crossing it, but to no avail, it seems like he could still contort himself out of it if he was panicked. He didn’t really like wearing it in the first place, and did all the usual cat-in-a-harness things like flopping over and refusing to walk, and generally looking unhappy. So now I just have a useless harness. It really is too bad, because I like the way it goes on and uses Velcro instead of snaps. It’s well-made. Just.... not really good for cats.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product and wish it fit my dog, however, I went by the measurements on the size chart and the item, although it was supposedly XS, did not fit right. My dog is a small chihuahua with a 13 inch chest, but the XS harness I received was way too big on him. I really liked it, and if your dog is larger I would recommend. If you have a small dog, you need an XXS or XXXS, which was not available :(
customer_reviews.author: Latina

customer_reviews.title: Like these for my mini dachshunds
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mini doxies. Very happy with the fit as secure fit is difficult with doxies. The Velcro gives some adjustability. The red sable is wearing a small. Her neck is 10” and chest 16.” She weighs 10.6 lb. The black and tan is wearing XS. She weighs 8.8 lb. They both seem comfortable in the vests and they were very easy to put on. Can’t speak as to durability yet as we just received them.
customer_reviews.author: Pammer

customer_reviews.title: My 8 lb. poodle hates this.
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try a harness as a healthier (and I thought, more comfortable alternative to the 'rope around my neck' collar and leash paradigm. It's been about 2 months now, and this harness (plus an earlier, larger one have my otherwise love-any-walk poodle cowering under furniture when she sees the harness come out. I think it is binding her legs (though not tight at all) or maybe she hates the sound of the velcro ripping when I take it off (husband's theory)... We are still using it because I though the reinforcing value of a walk following getting it on would do the trick--but n-o-o-o...
customer_reviews.author: Bryna Siegel, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Wiggle proof
customer_reviews.text: Although not always easy to convince a cat to allow the vest to be put on, once on, your kitty will be happy to go for a walk and you'll feel good knowing they are safe from escape. The vest is sturdy, adjustable, and latches to the leash using two rings. Make sure to measure properly. Once the cat learns that putting on the vest means going for a walk, it gets easier.
customer_reviews.author: EllenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua approved:)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my chihuahua "Angus". He is a rescue and thank goodness he is not a big dog...he is quite the character. He thinks he owns the neighbor when I take him for a walk. This harness works perfectly for him. There is no chance he can wiggle out of it ( well I am pretty sure:) )It is lightweight, so it is perfect for use in the summer. It is well made and has a double hook for the leash, which makes it very secure. I purchased a small for him and he weights about 10 lbs. I highly recommend this harness, and I plan on buying it in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in life:)

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this three times. Each time the latch ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this three times. Each time the latch is impossible to open. I'm sending the third one back and trying a different harness. I tried so many times because I ordered this in blue for my male mini doxie and the latch opens perfectly!! My female mini doxie needs a harness as well. I can put her in it by putting it over her head and guiding her arms through the armholes. What a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Blue one fit and the red one is stretched out like it was used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest in the light blue and red. The blue one works perfect. The red one is the same size but feels stretched out. Sort of like someone had used it and returned it and it was sold again. I have no clue what's going on. I'm definitely not very happy with this. I almost thought I found the perfect harness for my little man. I was going to buy them in every color, but if they're not consistent then that's a problem. My dog could have got lose and since he's timid of noise, he could have ran off.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: The perfect harness
customer_reviews.text: Our newest rescue, "Vinnie" is a 6 lb Maltese (mix?) who is all attitude! He's also an escape artist. The harness provided to us by the rescue was too small and flimsy for him. I could not find one in the stores that was the right size - either too small or too big. Even for ones that fit, he would find a way to squeeze out of them and off he'd go!!! This harness is soft and comfy or him and wraps around his body like a warm hug. It's snug enough to not give him ANY room to squeeze his way out of it.
customer_reviews.author: rc hobbyist

customer_reviews.title: The product does not do as advertised although it's well ...
customer_reviews.text: The product does not do as advertised although it's well made and might do for a breed that has less trachea vulnerability. Our Yorkie still got choked on this product. I thought about remodeling it into a V-neck but found the hard vinyl reflectors at the front/side had sharp edges so were uncomfortable as well and had small stitches holding them on so would be difficult to remove without damaging the harness. I'll return it and opt for the expensive one that cannot touch his throat. He's worth it and it may save us a vet bill and possibly save his life at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for growing puppies!
customer_reviews.text: We love this harness so much that when our puppy out grew his first XS size (black, shown in photo), we got him another in the next size up. This harness is so easy to put on and we have never had any issues with escapes as it conforms to his body nicely. It’s well made - no loose ends or spots that will irritate his skin. We chose the baby blue this time and the color is so vibrant! It looks awesome on our little guy. Both harnesses have held up great even against puppy teeth. We will continue to purchase as he grows. This is a must buy for puppy parents!
customer_reviews.author: JTozzzz

customer_reviews.title: The harness on two different cats.
customer_reviews.text: I got an XS for my 10-11 lb "skinny" cat and a S for my 12-13 lb "husky" cat. They fit really well. They have been wearing them about 2-3 hours per day for a few days now in preparation for a big road trip. They seem to be holding up well even outdoors (although the edges do attract burs... no shock there). The cats have also not been able to escape them. Now just because I love them doesn't mean the cats do! So far they hate them and just flop around for the first 10 minutes or so when wearing them. But they don't seem uncomfortable just not used to being constricted. And don't they look cute?!
customer_reviews.author: Heather E. Risdon

customer_reviews.title: Easily escapable.
customer_reviews.text: My cats had no problem escaping out of this, and even the XS size doesn't fit my athletic cats tight enough to prevent it. Our largest boy had no issue escaping from this within 30 seconds. We've migrated to using the Kitty Holster Walking Harness style options and it has been the best investment. They're definitely pricier than these other harness options, but they are brilliant and I will never use another type. Cats cannot get elbows underneath to escape.
customer_reviews.author: Aemvee

customer_reviews.title: For dogs, not cats!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made—but NOT for cats! Cats have collapsible scapula (collarbones) and can wriggle free from harnesses that don’t come way up around their necks. I did not know this when I bought this product—and nearly lost my cat outdoors as a result. If you need a harness for a feline, order one made specifically for cats.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Buckle broke 30 days after purchase
customer_reviews.text: This harness fit great, it was soft and our dog seemed extremely comfortable. We were overall really happy with the product. The buckle broke clean off around 30 days after purchase. Not sure what happened, there wasn’t any excessive use or force with the buckle for it to break. We pretty much left it on him 24/7. Just outside of the Amazon return window and it appears difficult to contact/message the seller. Not sure if this is a poor quality buckle or if the one we had was defective. We can’t personally replace it either because of the way the buckle is sewn onto the harness. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Runs very very small
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product. I have a golden retriever puppy who is 5 month old and the XL was too small. The sizing on this harness is very small. I am disappointed I can't return it. I purchased it on September 19 and it's too small for our puppy who isn't very big yet. I was under the assumption an XL would fit a large dog breed.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Law

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: My puppy seems to be very comfortable in this harness. I had a really hard time getting on other harnesses because my puppy is so wiggly and wants to put everything in his mouth but this harness is so easy to get on. I do wish it had a front attachment as well as a back one though. Also a handle in the back would be nice. But this harness is great for the price and very good for a growing puppy. I will be buying this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, wonderful fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful fit for my fat little dachshund. I bought another in blue for Taz. These fit well, are easy to get on and off, and the hair doesn't stick them as much other harnesses I've used. I been using it daily for about 3 months and he's only managed to slip out of it once. Beats all the strappy type harnesses we've tried. I got both in size large. Sausage, the dachshund, is about 18 lbs and the white terrier Taz weighs about 14 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Adriane

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Harness!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled to have finally found an easy harness to put on and take off! I have a small dog, and she tends to move around a lot, making harnesses difficult. This harness is simple to put on, and it takes only an instant to put the harness on my dog. She loves it - she seems to feel very comfortable in it, and it stays put at all times. It fits exactly as the sizing chart states, and it looks just like the photos in the listing. I will definitely be ordering more of these, and this will be the only harness I use for my dog! Love it! SO easy to use and great looking as well!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M

customer_reviews.title: Great harness!
customer_reviews.text: Love this harness! My puppy also has no problems with it! It looks comfortable on him. It's not too tight, got a good quality mesh, and it's durable. My little guy may be small but he still loves to run at those squirrels. He has tugged so hard my arm jerks! This harness is still in great condition. I have an 8 month old pomeranian and a medium fits a little loose but the velcro adjustable top makes it easy to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: KellysKozys

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well for our Terrier
customer_reviews.text: Although we initially liked this harness, our Terrier with a 19" chest circumference has been able to slip out of the size Large harness twice so far. Fortunately, both times we were right next to him and able to pick him up and carry him home. However, if my youngest was walking him when this happened, the dog would be gone. Additionally, it's only been a few months of use and the fabric under one of the D ring attachment points is fraying. I don't know if the Velcro is rubbing here or not, but it has me concerned. This might be a great harness if it fit the dog better than this one fits our dog.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Great harness but small is too big for cat
customer_reviews.text: Great harness! Although the small isn't nearly the right size for my 2 year old cat. He's managed to slip out of it once already. I'll be ordering an extra small soon. But other then that the material is breathable and comfortable. The step in style is easier to get on and the clasps in the back are positioned perfect so as not to bother his shoulders. Highly recommend if your kitty loves to go outside
customer_reviews.author: Melissa CoyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Like the product but not the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Harness itself is decent in material/construction but size seems to run large, at least for my liking. My dog's chest measures at exactly 18" so I purchased a medium, which specifies it's for chests between 16"-18". I was expecting a tight fit but on the contrary, it's too loose. A light pull from the front and it slips right off the dog. In fairness, my dog has an 18" chest but she's also very skinny at 13lbs. Will try the next size down. UPDATE: The small fits much better, but still enough room to fit it over a coat. Bottom line, these appear to run rather large. Subtract 2" from your dog's chest measurement and order the corresponding size.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!  Excellent harness.  Easy to put on.  Soft and secure.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, soft, secure and lightweight. This is by far the best harness I have used. It’s very secure, yet soft and lightweight. It’s one piece rather than straps, so it doesn’t get tangled or inside out while you’re trying to put it on your pup. Once the front paws are in, just pull up the sides and secure with Velcro. Then, secure the plastic clip, and hook on your leash. As a plus, it dries quickly between walks. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. Camps

customer_reviews.title: Great for Large cats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this used and it’s in great condition. I’ve gone through seven other harness suppliers before purchasing this and I can’t explain how happy I am to finally find one that fits my giant raccoon chicken. This guy is part Maine coon and weighs about 25 pounds. Most dog harness are too big around the neck and he gets his feet stuck in it but this one is perfect. The Velcro fasten allows for a looser or tighter fit and he just steps into it which helps with the hassle of getting ready to go out. I purchased a size small since it is for dogs mostly so it fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: After a bit of a snag in the beginning, my girl did receive her harness, I am so happy I got the harness and like it much better than the leash from the humane society, but they are a wonderful organization and I am very happy with my new girl. I was worried that I may have ordered a size too big, but it fits perfectly. Took a bit of coaxing for her to get the hang of it, but she is fine now, Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Stretches and dog slipped right out of it.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great harness when I ordered it a few weeks ago. Ordered by the measurements and it fit our 10 pound, 10 month old dog perfectly. Fast forward to this morning. I had her out in the yard, on a leash, and she just wiggled herself right out of it. It must have stretched. Our yard is fenced, but she is small and would have no problem slipping under the fence we currently have. I grabbed her just in time. Thank goodness we weren't out for a walk!!!
customer_reviews.author: Likes To Shop

customer_reviews.title: Who said it's just for dogs??
customer_reviews.text: This handsome little harness fits perfectly over our small 6th pound cat. Looks great on her too. I didn't want to hook a leash to a collar because I feel like I'm choking my animal, so this was the perfect choice. The measurement chart helped select the correct size, and there were plenty of colors to choose from. Fabric is nice and soft. Price is right. Good quality. Your dog / cat / animal will love it :)
customer_reviews.author: EPlam

customer_reviews.title: Cats easily escape
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my bengal cats. Both cats are like Houdini in these and free themselves easily. Not a sizing issue because I bought two different sizes. My one cat likes to walk outside so she doesn’t try to escape but my heavier bengal is scared outside. She escapes the smaller sized one n the one that is supposedly sized for her. She just squirms and backs her way out as I keep tight on the leash. Waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Harness that dogs can’t get out of
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russel is a hyper little escape artist!! I have tried so many harnesses and he always finds a way out! It’s been very frustrating. Until now! This harness is amazing!!!!!! He can’t back reverse out of it and he is very comfortable. It’s tight enough that its comfortable for him but also snug enough that he can’t get out. Plus, it’s super cute on him. Very happy customer. Wish I found this harness years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Easily Can Slip Out
customer_reviews.text: These harnesses are okay at best. They are soft and not very adjustable. The problem is when my dog walks in reverse, he can easily slip out of the harness. I was leaving the groomers with one of my dogs when he got spooked in the parking lot by another dog. In fear, he backed up and BOOM, he was out of the harness running wild down the street. It was so dangerous. Thank God we caught up with him before he was hit by a car.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hilton

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for our Mini Pin. The forward ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Mini Pin. The forward part of the harness sits right in the middle of the dogs neck, where it can seriously hurt the dog. It should lay at the base of the neck where it wont choke the dog.
customer_reviews.author: DirkPitt

customer_reviews.title: fit for a dog
customer_reviews.text: too big all around for my 11lb. cat. got the medium first according to weight and measurements but WAY to big. then ordered Small an still too big. loose around the shoulders and belly, a bit too small around the neck. It says in the ad that it fits cats as well as dogs, even gave measurements/weight for cats. Need to find a different one in a store that I can measure and handle before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Catchin' Up

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 6 lb. Chihuahua!
customer_reviews.text: After adopting a teeny 6 lb chihuahua this weekend, wife discovered how hard it was to find a decent harness that would fit this little guy. Couldn't find a step-in harness at a certain pet store, had to purchase an over-the-head harness. He was not a fan of having that one put on. Thankfully, Amazon had this one that matched his measurements. Although, at first look, wife was still worried it was too big, but then she put it on Lil' Dude and it fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Allums-Realtor

customer_reviews.title: works great, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: My cat tolerated this, she likes going on walks and her old harness was a pain to put on. This one is super easy and I Feel like its more secure and comfortable for her. Once outside she was happy, she doesn't look it in the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Afton

customer_reviews.title: My Pug Loves This Harness!
customer_reviews.text: This harness is so comfortable my dog steps into it before walks! Seriously, all I have to do is pull it up and Velcro then snap it. She loves to run at top speed but usually gets choked if I can’t stop her before her long leash ends. Also, pugs get hot but this is thin enough not to add too much heat to her core. Sizing is tricky. My dog is 21lbs but has a huge pug chest so I got the extra large & it fits nicely. It would also fit my 48lb border collie so it has a little give. I’m sure the large would be a bit snugger, but this works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Skimom03

customer_reviews.title: 25lb lab mix puppy - large; works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new 25lb lab mix puppy since its easier to walk a puppy in a harness. No complaints! Fits her well, with some room - although her paws are pretty big, I don't expect this to work for too long. I assume she will outgrow this in about a month. Easy to put on, easy to take off - great for walks. Like most puppies, she gets a little frustrated and tries to wiggle around when I pull on the leash, and the harness is very secure. She also seems to be scratching herself quite a bit and the harness still looks like new. I have also washed it a couple times, and its still great!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: A miracle for our dog.
customer_reviews.text: We have a rescue baby, that for whatever reason, went absolutely nuts on a collar & leash. We decided to try this chest harness. It's a miracle!. Now when my wife grabs the harness, Trident, our dog, dances in circles and loves to go for his walks. Quality material, no pinch points, well designed. We were in an overlapping size between small and medium. We bought the small and it is perfect. The only negative is that our old leash had a small clasp on it and this one needs a larger clasp to fit the double attachment rings. We bought one a Dollar Tree for $1 and no further issues.
customer_reviews.author: John of Ft Worth

customer_reviews.title: Great dog harness!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my dog who'd broken his old one. We go on walks all the time and needed a comfortable, dependable harness. This one fits the bill perfectly and the color is pretty! Our dog is a chihuahua and weighs about 10 lbs. We got him a size small in the baby blue and black. It's a perfect fit. I do recommend measuring your animal to make sure you get the right size! The mesh is so soft and comfortable and moveable, and at the same time sturdy. He's not wiggling loose in this one! Which is good because he tries to chase cars! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kathey Gray

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: This product was unfortunately smaller than expected. We bought a small as this was the size requirements stated for our size dog. He's a corgi Miniature Australian Shepard mix and no more than 13 lbs. He's a very small dog and we were expecting this to fit him well. The small size harness is more likely fit for the size for a medium sized cat (less than 8 lbs). This was my biggest gripe. The material seems fine enough for the price, no loose stitching so may be something that lasts a while, especially if you're training your dog not to tug on the leash. I wouldn't not buy it again, but I wish the sizes were more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. My puppy could have been killed by ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the harness about a month and my four month old puppy the snapped the harness. Very poor quality. My puppy could have been killed by a car she ran out into the parking lot at my condo. Running around and me trying to catch her. The strap that holds the clip for the dog leash ripped right off. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS HARNESS.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness. It is very well made, is easy to use and looks great. I chose the orange with matching trim, and it is a pretty, soft orange -- not neon. The only shortcoming is that the harness isn't adjustable (see photo of the harness from the back). Dogs grow and their harnesses need to grow with them. Flossie measures 18" around her chest, 11.5" around her neck. The Medium size (16-18")fits her perfectly, but snugly. I'm sure the next size would be too big. So if your dog is full-grown, this is a perfect harness -- and a good incentive for them not to gain weight!
customer_reviews.author: Twig

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Vest but NOT TRUE TO SIZE CHART!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice little vest but not true to size. Runs small so need to order the next size up to be sure. The chest measurements are too small. Too tight on my girl. Need to return and exchange. UPDATE: STILL NOT TRUE TO SIZE CHARTS. Size XS was too small and size SMALL is too big!! Very frustrating because this is a nice vest and I really like it. I only hope they will allow another return. If you have a small dog, beware! Maybe the bigger sizes work ok. My dog is 6 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: God'sSonshineGal

customer_reviews.title: Great quality harness!
customer_reviews.text: Love this harness! My cat is a 14 lb tabby and the medium was not too tight or loose. He got used to it pretty fast and thankfully I can quickly put it on him without much fuss. Great quality. He did slip out of it once so far but that was during a rather dramatic encounter (eye roll). And I can’t get over how cute he looks in it, even though daddy says it looks like he’s wearing a bra haha.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Purfffect
customer_reviews.text: We have had so many issues trying to find a harness that fits our small Pomeranian correctly! We ordered this in a small ---- was too big! So we ordered an xsmal and it fits PERFECTLY!!! Her previous harness she would slip her leg out and ran out of which is not okay so when the xsmall came in i was nervous to take her outside but she cant slip her leg through!
customer_reviews.author: Katarina Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Fits a tweleve pound puppy just right
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a small 12 pound Havanese puppy that has lots of curly hair that is long. Fitment was spot on and he looks good wearing it. He doesn't seem to mind the " Step Through " design and having it on him keeps him safer around any dangerous areas with out hurting the puppy incase you had to snatch him up real quick. This pulls on his chest area and doesn't pinch his from legs or paws and short enough to keep potty breaks off the product. Fast racing red design doesn'y hurt either,. but it comes in lots of color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Manshoon

customer_reviews.title: Good security
customer_reviews.text: Good harness. Don’t listen to the bad reviews. They probably had the wrong size and left it on their dog 24/7. This is a nice, easy to use harness. I like the security of Velcro, locking clip and two d-rings so there’s no chance of the vest coming loose. You may need a new leash with it though because the tiny clasp on mine didn’t fit the d-rings, had to get a leash to fit. I just ordered another one in a different color, and Will get another one of these if I ever need a new one. Addendum: this is my second, still think it’s great. Sent one to my sister for her dogs too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he fights having these things put on like he's suddenly feral and he can weasel out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have unsuccessfully tried a few different harnesses for my 15 lb chihuahua-minpin mix. I always encounter two issues... he fights having these things put on like he's suddenly feral and he can weasel out of most things eventually. That being said, I love this harness. Incredibly easy to get him to wear it without a fight because it's literally just two arm holes and a fastener in the back... got it on him before he even knew what was happening. And he doesn't even try to escape it because it fits like a glove and is comfortable (I'm assuming, from the looks of it). Very nice product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Great harness!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I bought the small for my Pomeranian and it fits perfectly! No need to buy the new version. This is awesome. It has Velcro closure as well as snap together closure. Very soft and apparently very comfortable according to the way my dog reacted when i put it on. I’m going to order another for my dog in a different color. The blue is very nice! This is not cheaply made. I priced the same harness in Petsmart for $35. I’m so pleased I found this! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good price, decent product
customer_reviews.text: The price point is excellent and the overall look and feel of the harness is great. I love how many color options there are. However, the double ring design where you attach the leash is cumbersome and clunky. This could use a better design with a single (lightweight) ring so small dogs and puppies learning to walk have the weight of the harness evenly distributed. The description of the product is accurate and works best with small dogs and cats. This is the third harness I've purchased for my growing puppy (see: price point) and now that he's 35 lbs and wearing a size large, I'll need to find a new product to try.
customer_reviews.author: sahmusa

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dog because her other harness was rubbing her under her legs (armpits?). This is very comfortable and she hasn't had any irritation at all. I took off 1 star only because the sizing is a little funky. She slightly too small for the XL, but slightly too big for the L. She is a jack russell/beagle mix and weighs about 30 pounds for reference. We measured her chest/back/etc. and went with the XL & it works but she could stand it to be a hair tighter. It's not so loose that she could wiggle out of it, so I took off a star, but it may honestly just be due to my dogs body shape.
customer_reviews.author: C. Franks

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION - RUNS VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute harness and I was happy to find it for under $13.00. However, these harnesses run very very small. I have a maltese who wears a medium dog size in everything. I could not get this medium harness around him, there was about a 2 inch gap. Given I liked the look and feel of this harness and the fact I need one for my dog, I reordered it in a large. However again, they charged me $7.01 shipping to return it. The harness was only $12.99 so... my refund of $5.98 will go toward the next size up. I will not be purchasing from them again. Highly disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought three for my chihuahuas they’re various in size at first I ordered a size too small, I went ahead and just ordered the next size up and they seem much more comfortable and stretchy than the last harness we had been using for them. This one doesn’t rub up on their elbows and seems very secure. We will be using them everyday multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly venable

customer_reviews.title: The best I've used for years for all my dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful harness. I ordered small for my adult daschund who measured 14" so the small should have fit, but it was at least an inch short of connecting the velcro and buckle. I did an exchange for a medium and had good customer support. I had to ship the small back by UPS via a label I printed out. I haven't received a response as to whether the seller received the small one. I've used this brand and style on Jack Russells too. I won't use any other kind because this style doesn't pull on the dog's larynx, which can be easily damaged. So far my Houdini hasn't been able to wriggle out of hers. Excellent harness.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dog harness!!!
customer_reviews.text: My pug gets the best of everything. I have been searching high and low for this type of harnesses forever. I am so glad I found them on Amazon. All the positive reviews helped so much. I ordered one for trial and it fits my pug PERFECTLY! The sizing chart is very accurate. His measurements are: Neck 18 1/2", Chest 23", Waist 19", Length from ears to tail 15". I bought an XL. I was so impressed I went back and purchased 4 more in different colors. The suede vest is really cute. The harness is so easy to put on and take off, and he is so much more comfortable in it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Health Nut

customer_reviews.title: This is a secure harness
customer_reviews.text: I ordered both Harnesses that Voyager makes. With this the dog has to step in the leg holes to attach it. Once you've got the dog's feet in it's easy. You wrap the Velcro, and secure it with the lock. Plus there are two metal rings to attach the clasp from the leash on top of the lock. It is very secure. This is really more like a vest, and very secure. My dog escaped from two other harnesses, but not the Voyager Harnesses. I feel that this one will be better in a thunderstorm or when it gets cooler outside. It's in the 90's here and my dog has long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best harness for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this harness for 3 dogs. I like that it is all soft (except clip and rings). I’ve tried several partially soft and nylon harnesses, they all seem uncomfortable in some way: plastic adjustments, tight under front legs or just not a fit. These are small, XS fit my Cavalier puppy (at 8 lbs), he grew thru S and M (15 lbs). My mini Australian Shepard is L at 22 lbs full grown. My 20 lb Shetland Sheepdog wore L.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/off, comfortable, and secure.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little harness for my miniature dachshund. She started wearing this when she was about 6 lb and it still fits at 9.5 lb. I originally purchased the small, but it was a bit too big. She is just on the verge of the small now, but I think the xs is still the best. Not sure if she grows much more. It is soft and gives so it seems very comfy for her. She doesn't seem to mind wearing it. It is also very easy to put on and it is secure when it is on, if you have the right size. Excellent design and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Padded and safe
customer_reviews.text: We’ve bought three of these now, one for the cat and two for the growing puppy. They’re great and well-padded for riding in the car or the sxs, they stay closed and I haven’t had a problem with the dog trying to chew it off or anything. They’re tiny- our cocker puppy in the photo was in a M at four months old and it’s too small now at 5 months so I got an XL which I’m hoping will fit when he’s full grown. Anyway, if you have a small dog who you need to tie into a boat or utility vehicle or even just for the car, these are great and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Coss

customer_reviews.title: Alexa Walk The Dog
customer_reviews.text: Love this harness. I have bought 3 from this company. A red blue and pink one. 2 sized med and 1 xlarge. I feel like the fur baby's love them. I mean seriously when I walk toward the closet they know I what I am going to get. They are super excited and happy to wear it. The size is correct as well it fits as it should and seems to be indestructible which is very important when it comes to Frenchies. Being honest I can't see buying a name brand when this honestly functions and is as great quality as the competitors. Now if I could only say...Alexa walk the dog...
customer_reviews.author: Ask The Gnome

customer_reviews.title: Joey loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our dog Joey loves this harness and so do I. He weighs 21 pounds and we bought him a size large. The large gives him plenty of room and won't irritate his armpits. If you want a super snug fit, get a medium. It has velcro so you can make it more snug or loosen it. On top on the velcro is a security clip. Then two D rings to attach to your leash. I have washed it numerous times and it still looks like new. The owner has control of the dog when using this harness. Our dog likes it so much he puts both front legs up when it's time to put it on. Great harness.
customer_reviews.author: luv2shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Gives my cat some freedom
customer_reviews.text: Overall ..this was a great purchase for our cat. He begs to be outdoors but its very unsafe around our house with busy cars and large birds. I can't say he likes his harness but once it's on - he loves being outside with some freedom. It seems to challenge his balance, which slows him down. The leash trailing is good to keep him semi-close while he explores. However, he has learned to slip the harness over his head to escape! But, he can only do that when the leash is resisting. If the leash is loose, he tries to 'back out' of it but he is unable without the leash restraint.
customer_reviews.author: mykidz9598

customer_reviews.title: Tiny tiny no matter the size. Not for larger puppies or medium size dogs.
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE of sizes. We bought a medium for our 4 month old lab. He’s not that big and pretty average for a puppy. Surely he’s not a “large dog” even our female boxer who is significantly bigger than him isn’t a very large dog. The medium was way too small. I would consider the medium a small or less. If you have any dog that isn’t tiny tiny, you may want to reconsider. I’m not even going to bother with the large because I’m afraid that will be too small too.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Harness, But Noisy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this harness. I have a little Bichon who is fine going for walks until he sees another dog, then he freaks out, barking and lunging. I need a harness that will hold him and this one is good. I also like the look of the harness, the comfortable material, and the ease in putting it on. I did take off one star for the noise - the plastic clips on the top bang and clack together when there is no leash clipped on them and the noise is pretty loud (with the leash on it's no problem). For this reason we only use the harness when going for walks. Still, it is a good harness.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. H.

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied! Nice design and craftsmanship! Kudos!
customer_reviews.text: I am SUPER pleased with this harness! I have a Miniature Dachshund and she is really tiny. Only about 6.9 lbs. I almost ordered the XS size but because of her large breastbone (like most Dachshunds have) I went with the S size. I believe this is a good fit for her. The texture and design seems that it would be very comfortable for her to wear and the bottom portion does not go to one side like the previous one we were using. Nor is there anything that would cause irritation under her legs (armpits). Now I want to order another one for variety in colors! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: CS Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Great harness
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness but the only reason i did not give it 5 stars is because i had to return it. I have a netherland dwarf bunny, about 2-3 pounds. when i saw that it fit kittens i ordered it. i love the quality and i ordered the pink color which was adorable! i put this on her inside in case she slipped out and she did! she slipped out in like 3 seconds. this would be great for a bigger bunny/animal but not for Netherland dwarfs!! I love that it has the velcro and the buckle but it still did not save my bunny from slipping out.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Too smalland I got the largest size
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dog and it was still snug to wear. The velcro wouldn't hold be cause it was too snug around his chest. However, the latch keeps it on. I don't see were it will be any more comfortable for my dog. It still comes under his armpits. I thought there would be more material so the red would be more visible for safety. His dog hair sticks to it like glue. It seems well made. My dog won't let me put it on him any more so I have to go back to the other style harness. I will probably give it away if I can get the dog hair off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Easy On/Off
customer_reviews.text: This harness works pretty well on my dog (who resists other types of harnesses). Easy to get on and take off. My puppy has transitioned from XS to Small. She'll soon be in a Medium. I've started to notice mild restriction by shoulder area so I may need to sensitize her to other styles of harnesses soon. In the meantime, this works fine for going out for a potty stroll. A great starter harness! (Note: if your pup is sensitive to velcro sounds, that might bother your pup when harness is removed. May take some training/desensitization.)
customer_reviews.author: A Lady on the Internet

customer_reviews.title: No irritation to dog's skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this harness! We walk our pup several times a day so we just replaced this harness with a new identical one. The reason we had to replace it is because the velcro was extremely worn, but it's normal wear and tear. With the low price, I don't mind buying it once a year. We love this harness because it's soft and doesn't cause irritation on our pups skin. It's easy to take on and off.
customer_reviews.author: srh5213

product_meta.title: Voyager Step-in Air Dog Harness - All Weather Mesh, Step in Vest Harness for Small and Medium Dogs by Best Pet Supplies
product_meta.description: Size:S (Chest: 14.5 - 17")| Color:PurpleCOMFORTABLY WALK YOUR PET NO MATTER THE WEATHER Our Step-in Air All-Weather harness is designed to ensure that regardless of the conditions outside, youll still manage to take your pet on those walks that get their tail wagging like crazy. Weve used mesh material that is breathable to keep your dog or pet cool on hot days, but also provides insulation for those chilly occasions And its going to be one comfy walk for your furball Unlike leashes that have the tendency to strain your pets neck, this safety harness evenly distributes the pressure around the chest to prevent any kind of choking. Stress Free Walks Is it always a struggle trying to get your pet in most harnesses? Well, youll love just how easy this step in harness is to put on Simply have your dog walk into it with their front legs, attach a leash, and youre good to go. But what really makes this support harness a must-have is how secure it is. Weve fitted it with a strong closure and heavy duty metal D-rings for double security. So youll never have to worry about your dog wiggling out of the harness while on your walks. Here are more reasons to love this great harness: • Non irritating material allows for all-day wear. • Available in a wide range of sizes (Please refer to the sizing chart). • Made with great attention to detail to ensure maximum durability. • Securely holds your pet while still being gentle. • Beautiful choice of colors to suit your pets personality.
feature_bullets: ATTENTION: Sizing does NOT directly correspond to your pet’s breed or weight. Please MEASURE your pet and refer to our sizing chart for the best fit before ordering.
ALL WEATHER MESH: Made with a soft, breathable air mesh, this lightweight pet harness is perfect for walks all year round.
REFLECTIVE BANDS: Two reflective bands on the sides of this harness enhance your pet’s visibility for those early morning and late evening strolls.
THREE SAFETY FEATURES: Our hook and loop fastener, buckle and double D-rings work together protect your pet in three layers of security.
STEP IN, CLIP & GO. Step into your next walk in this simple and easy-to-wear vest harness. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
